heading: Is Gyoza gluten free?
intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Gyoza and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Gyoza typically contains wheat-based wrappers, which pose a significant gluten risk. Cross-contamination during preparation can also be a concern.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
sections.body: Watch for hidden sources like soy sauce, malt flavoring, marinades, thickeners, and shared fryers.
